mapper.sql: fid, criminal_id, criminal_name, question_no, result, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from question_result where question_no = #{questionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and create_time >= date_add(str_to_date( #{start},'%Y-%m-%d'), interval -1 day) and create_time <= date_add(str_to_date( #{end},'%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day) order by fid asc
mapper.insert:
insert into question_result
fid,
criminal_id,
criminal_name,
question_no,
result,
create_time,
#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{criminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{criminalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{questionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update question_result
criminal_id = #{criminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
criminal_name = #{criminalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_no = #{questionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update question_result set criminal_id = #{criminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, criminal_name = #{criminalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question_no = #{questionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
